name: integracao-dataprovider-api
description: Automaçao de testes do serviço 'integracao-dataproviver-api' com Cypress

scripts.test_crhome: npx cypress run -b chrome --config video=false --reporter mochawesome
scripts.test_firefox: npx cypress run -b firefox --config video=false --reporter mochawesome
scripts.clean_all: npm run clean_reports && npm run clean_screenshots && npm run clean_videos

author: Fernando Borlone
